terms-introduction-content:
These website terms and conditions written on this page govern your use of @name, accessible at @link.

These conditions will be applied in full and will affect your use of this website. By using it, you have accepted all the conditions written here. You must not use this website if you do not agree with any of these terms and conditions.

Minors or persons under the age of 18 are not permitted to use this website.
terms-property-content:
Except for the content you own, under these terms, @name and/or its licensors own all intellectual property rights and materials contained in this website.

Our Terms and Conditions have been generated at https://www.termsandconditionstemplate.net.

A limited license is granted to you solely for the purpose of viewing the material contained on this website.
terms-restrictions-content:
You are specifically prohibited from doing any of the following :

• Publish any material from this website in any other media.
• Sell, sublicense and/or otherwise commercialize any material from this website.
• Perform and/or publicly display any material from this website.
• Use this website in any manner that is or may be detrimental to this website.
• Use this website in a manner that affects users' access to this website.
• Using this website in violation of applicable laws and regulations, or in a manner that may be detrimental to this website or any person or business entity.
• Engaging in data mining, data collection, data extraction or any other similar activity in connection with this website.
• Use this website to engage in any advertising or marketing.

Access to certain areas of this website is restricted and @name may further restrict your access to any area of this website, at any time, in its sole discretion. The username and password you may have for this web site are confidential and you are responsible for keeping them confidential.
terms-content-content:
In these terms and conditions of use of this website, "your content" means any audio, video, image or other material you choose to post on this website. By posting your content, you grant @name a non-exclusive, worldwide, irrevocable and sub-licensable license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate and distribute it in any media.

Your content must belong to you and must not infringe the rights of any third party. @name reserves the right to remove any element of your content from this website at any time and without notice.
terms-warranties-content: This website is provided "as is", with all faults, and @name makes no representations or warranties of any kind regarding this website or the materials contained therein. Furthermore, nothing contained on this website should be construed as advice to you.
terms-liability-content: In no event shall @name, nor any of its officers, directors and employees, be liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this web site, whether such liability is contractual. @name, including its officers, directors and employees shall not be liable for any indirect, consequential or special liability arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this web site.
terms-indemnification-content: You hereby indemnify to the fullest extent @name from and against any and all liability, costs, demands, causes of action, damages and expenses in any way related to your breach of any of the provisions of these terms.
terms-severability-content: If any provision of these terms is held to be invalid under applicable law, that provision shall be severed without affecting the remaining provisions of these terms.
terms-variation-content: @name is entitled to revise these terms at any time as it sees fit, and by using this website, you are expected to review these terms regularly.
terms-assignment-content: @name is authorized to assign, transfer and subcontract its rights and/or obligations under the present conditions without any notification. However, you are not authorized to assign, transfer or subcontract any of your rights and/or obligations under the present conditions.
terms-agreement-content: These terms constitute the entire agreement between @name and you with respect to your use of this website, and supersede all prior agreements and arrangements.
terms-law-content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the European Union, and you submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in European Union for the resolution of any dispute.
privacy-introduction-content:
At @name, accessible from @link, one of our main priorities is to respect the privacy of our visitors. This privacy policy document contains the types of information that are collected and recorded by @name and how we use them.

If you have additional questions or would like more information about our privacy policy, please contact us.

Our Privacy Policy was generated with the help of https://www.gdprprivacypolicy.net.
privacy-gdpr-content:
We are a data controller of your information.

@name's legal basis for collecting and using the personal information described in this privacy policy depends on the personal information we collect and the specific context in which we collect the information :

• @name needs to perform a contract with you.
• You have given @name permission to do so.
• The processing of your personal information is in the legitimate interest of @name.
• @name must comply with the law.

@name will keep your personal information only as long as necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes and enforce our policies.

If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights. If you would like to be informed about the personal information we hold about you and if you would like it deleted from our systems, please contact us.

In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights :

• The right to access, update or delete information we hold about you.
• The right to rectification.
• The right to object.
• The right of restriction.
• The right to data portability.
• The right to withdraw consent.
privacy-log-content: @name follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files record visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and it is part of the analysis of the hosting services. The information collected by log files includes Internet Protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time, referring and exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. This data is not linked to personally identifiable information. The purpose of this information is to analyze trends, administer the site, track users' movements around the site and gather demographic information.
privacy-policies-content:
You can consult this list to find the privacy policy of each of @name's advertising partners.

Third party ad servers or ad networks use technologies such as Cookies, JavaScript or Web Beacons that are used in their respective ads and links that appear on @name, which are sent directly to the users browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this happens. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content you see on the websites you visit.

Note that @name has no access or control over these cookies that are used by third party advertisers.
privacy-third-content:
@name's privacy policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites so we advise you to check the respective privacy policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions on how to opt-out.

You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. For more detailed information about cookie handling with specific web browsers, you can find them on the browsers' respective websites.
privacy-children-content:
Another part of our priority is to add protection for children when they use the Internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

If you believe that your child has provided this type of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best to promptly delete this information from our records.
privacy-online-content: Our privacy policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with respect to information they have shared and/or collected in @name. This policy does not apply to information collected offline or through channels other than this website.
privacy-consent-content: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and accept its Terms and Conditions.

You can change this information on the Settings page of your Account.
